column4: Does anyone have a problem with totem not playing dvds right? I mean that when you put the dvd, totem auto plays them (but without menus) but then when you restart the dvd manually using totem it says it cant find the codecs, but they are installed and VLC plays them fine.
VLC doesn't use external codecs. So that's irelevant.
VLC has it's own internal codecs. It doesn't use 3rd party codecs.
it does this with like 6 dvd's ive tried.
